name: The Mistic Way to the Nine Falls
description: Ww will start in our capital In Rio de Janeiro city. our trip by car will have 3 hours.  in the lasts 40 minutes by car We have a mountain called Mantiqueira Montain. We will use our car ( Pajero TR4 ) to enjoy this place. We have a amazing view when we are going up the montain. Once we are in Maringá Village we can enjoy many tracks, many waterfalls, eat an amazing food in a different weather than Rio capital. (cool)
